EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-11-23
EmailTemplate.subject: How Express Scripts Scales Health and Technology with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 23, 2018 <[[https://youtu.be/s86XOsiA_ro]]> How Express Scripts Scales Health and Technology with Pivotal Express Scripts helps nearly 100 million people with pharmacy benefits and medical benefit management. They have over 3,000 software engineers, but they’re able to oversee nearly 10,000 containers with just eight operators, thanks to Pivotal. Watch The Story <[[https://youtu.be/s86XOsiA_ro]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/merrill-corp-pivotal-thomas-fredell?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> The Sky’s The Limit For Merrill Corporation Thomas Fredell, Chief Product Officer at Merrill Corporation, sat down with Jeff Kelly on the Pivotal Stories stage at SpringOne Platform 2018 to detail their three-years-and-counting digital transformation journey and the accomplishments they’ve made along the way. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/merrill-corp-pivotal-thomas-fredell?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/how-pivotal-is-helping-retailers-improve-the-in-store-experience-through-better-software?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> How Pivotal is Helping Retailers Improve the In-Store Experience Through Better Software During this holiday season, learn how well-designed applications can go a long way toward solving the obstacles facing retailers today. Read More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/how-pivotal-is-helping-retailers-improve-the-in-store-experience-through-better-software?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/questionnaire?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/videos/pivotal-act-transforming-how-all-of-the-world-builds-software?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Pivotal Act—Transforming How All of the World Builds Software Aly Blenkin and Ellie Ereira sat down with Jeff Kelly at SpringOne Platform in September to discuss Pivotal Act, its origins, and what they’ve achieved so far. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/pivotal-act-transforming-how-all-of-the-world-builds-software?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-middle-management-bind-with-carl-carl-coryell-martin?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> The Middle-Management Bind, with Carl Carl Coryell-Martin (Ep. 117) Richard and Coté chat with Pivotal's Carl Coryell-Martin about pulling apart the bureaucratic bowl of spaghetti that comes about when a large organization undergoes their digital transformation journey. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/the-middle-management-bind-with-carl-carl-coryell-martin?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-platform-solutions-why-you-should-treat-platform-as-a-product?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-linkl&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Why You Should Treat Platform as a Product In this white paper, we equip you with the right frame of mind and tool-set to get your app development team from having an idea in the morning to running in production by the afternoon. Read the White Paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-platform-solutions-why-you-should-treat-platform-as-a-product?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-linkl&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://blogs.perficient.com/2018/11/06/qa-with-pivotal-the-evolution-of-software-development/> The Evolution of Software Development Our own Jeff Kelly chatted with Perficient about his take on the evolution of software development, Pivotal's vision for the future, and advice for development teams. Check it Out <[[https://blogs.perficient.com/2018/11/06/qa-with-pivotal-the-evolution-of-software-development/]]> Upcoming Events 11/28, Continuous Delivery to the Cloud: Automate Thru Production with CI + Spinnaker, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-28-continuous-delivery-to-the-cloud-automate-thru-production-with-ci-spinnaker-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
11/29, Better Deployments with Sub Environments Using Spring Cloud and Netflix Ribbon, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/nov-29-better-deployments-with-sub-environments-using-spring-cloud-and-netflix-ribbon-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
12/04-12/05, SpringOne Tour, Paris <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/paris]]>
